article_title: Netanyahu: Israeli forces will move to Lebanon border as Rafah winds down
sentence: Hezbollah  has  been  launching  missiles,  rockets  and  drones  into  northern  Israel  in  support  of  Hamas  since  the  day  after  the  7  October  attacks  in  southern  Israel,  when  gunmen  from  Gaza  killed  about  1,200  people  and  took  251  others  as  hostages.

article_title: Netanyahu: Israeli forces will move to Lebanon border as Rafah winds down
sentence: More  than  37,620  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  during  the  military  campaign  that  Israel  launched  in  response,  according  to  the  Palestinian  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.

article_title: Netanyahu: Israeli forces will move to Lebanon border as Rafah winds down
sentence: Mr  Netanyahu  also  said  he  was  ready  for  a  “partial  deal”  that  would  secure  the  release  of  the  remaining  116  hostages  still  in  captivity  -  41  of  whom  are  presumed  dead  -  but  that  he  was  committed  to  completing  “the  goal  of  destroying  Hamas”.

sentence: “We  must  approve  and  implement  an  agreement  that  will  bring  all  hostages  home  -  the  living  for  rehabilitation  and  the  murdered  for  proper  burial!”

article_title: Netanyahu: Israeli forces will move to Lebanon border as Rafah winds down
sentence: Hamas  also  condemned  the  reported  killing  on  Sunday  of  eight  people  in  an  Israeli  air  strike  on  a  vocational  college  in  Gaza  City  run  by  the  UN  Palestinian  refugee  agency,  Unrwa,  which  was  being  used  as  an  aid  distribution  point.

sentence: The  IDF  announced  on  Monday  that  it  had  killed  a  Hamas  commander  responsible  for  projects  and  development  at  the  group’s  weapons  manufacturing  headquarters  in  an  overnight  air  strike,  without  giving  a  location.
